attributes.action: Give Capt. Tom Moore a Knighthood
attributes.additional_details: Acknowledge his efforts and make him a Knight.
attributes.background:
Capt. Tom Moore is a 99 year old WW2 veteran and was attempting to raise a small amount of money for the NHS during the Covid 19 crisis in support of the frontline staff.
His actions has raised in excess of £7 million.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
